subject: Golf
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Padraig Harrington, who won two majors, was voted player of the year by the Golf Writers Association of America, receiving 75 percent of the vote and ending Tiger Woods’s three-year run of winning the award. Lorena Ochoa was the overwhelming choice for female player of the year, and Jay Haas became the first golfer to win the senior player of the year award three times in a row.
